website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive package that offers those new to MIG welding all they need to get started – and for very little money.
pros: Lots of positive feedback from those who bought it as a first MIG welder or for doing small jobs
It's highly portable and largely problem-free
cons: Supplied welding wire could be better
Gun is always "live," so care is needed

customer_reviews.title: No fuss setup, great functionality and portability. Can be run off a generator out in the field too!
customer_reviews.text: Read some reviews saying the MIG 130's weren't very powerful, but for ~$85USD I figured I would give it a whirl since my stick welder is a bit of a pain for finer detail work. The MIG 130 welder that I received works great! Plugged it into the dedicated 30A line I ran to the workshop for heavy duty tools and it welded like a champ! Tested it on some 1/2" steel plate and it tackled it with no issues (a caveat: I did grind a chamfer first). Setting the power to Min-2 and wire feed backed off to 5 was just right for welding back together a crack in the base plate of an old office chair too.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: After getting tired of stick welding, this made my day
customer_reviews.text: I have not had good experience with cheap stick welders. I was skeptical about trying this one, but it works absolutely GREAT!! This welder is perfect for beginners, EXTREMELY easy to use, and seems to be of decent quality for the price. It is good for small jobs around the house and in my cars. I did buy a separate MIG wire because of other reviews saying that the wire it comes with does not work perfect. Unfortunately, being it was shipped with FedEx, the mask it came with was completely shattered. Luckily, I already have a mask. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great welder for the price but get a different mask.
customer_reviews.text: Great little welder. I was able to (carefully) weld 20 gauge sheet to 1/4" rod (not easy to get good penetration on the 1/4" without burning through the sheet); at high power was able to weld 1/4" together and get a decent weld. Way better than anything I would have expected for such a low cost welder. 4 stars because of the "mask" they include-- it's a complete toy and has to be held with your free hand. If they didn't include it and just said you need to buy a decent mask separately (you can get a great one for $20), I probably would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: I could not make a decent weld no matter how I tried.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to weld 1/8" steel. Welder would trip circuit breaker as soon as I would strike an ark. I moved to another receptacle and I could weld for about twenty seconds and again trip the breaker. Moved to a receptacle just below the main panel. I could weld but could not hold a steady burn. Finally gave up and returned the welder.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off
customer_reviews.text: This was a rip off, it's been sitting waiting for mine to die, well this weekend it did so I took out this one got it ready and it kept tripping the breaker, well I know a few things about welders so I opened it up and you'll never guess, it was melted inside. This had to be a return that was sent back out by mistake, I tossed it in the garbage because theses no way I was going to get my money back. All I can say is don't buy these I've read the reviews afterwards and it all fell on me at this point.
customer_reviews.author: lanis d capshaw

customer_reviews.title: Works good so far wire is always live without pulling trigger ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good so far wire is always live without pulling trigger so don't bump anything with it the mask is worthless though broke it just talking it out of the box 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Brad debruyn

customer_reviews.title: Wire feed problems
customer_reviews.text: The wire feed is way too fast at its lowest setting. I end up with 2-3 inches of wire hanging before I can even get a tack weld finished. If you don't mind a sloppy looking weld and all you require is getting two pieces of metal cobbled together it will do. I'm getting pretty good at grinding a bad weld though. I've had a 350 Lincoln stick welder and a set of gas torches in the past, but now I'm retired and have only a SMALL garage so thought I'd try this. Wish I had my O/A set.
customer_reviews.author: G. Castle

customer_reviews.title: Great home project beginning machine
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad machine. Instructions were terrible, so the learning curve was pretty steep. Settings as far as I can tell are (from lowest to highest) Low/1 Low/2 High/1 High/2 The wire that came with it was low quality but still worked alright. Wish it had an option to switch polarity but still does good as is. I was able to make this bad boy of a mask with the machine and was even able to join sheet and plate steel without too much effort. The mask is supposed to have a rough/beat up look, so don't judge the machine by my choices to do rough welding. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: i am a complete novice welding. using the flux in wire works but has lots of spatter. I bought some lincoln brand wire and it worked better. the instructions with it appear to be for a different welder with gas and the controls noted are not the same as on the welder. used it to fix a kink in an exhaust pipe to avoid buying a new assembly for $1100 bucks. had to cut a wedge and overlay a patch. weld is ugly but doesnt leak. for $100 bucks it will stay in the garage for little jobs that alway come up.
customer_reviews.author: WSD

customer_reviews.title: Great little welder. Min/Max 1/2 mystery solved (see pic)!
customer_reviews.text: Having barely any previous welding experience I bought this and watched a bunch of youtube videos and I was actually able to make stuff stick together. Not beautiful welds, but that's my lack of skill. I've seen some pretty nice weld in the videos I've watched. It will trip breakers but just pause every inch or so and give things a few moments to settle and you'll keep moving. Be sure to get some anti-spatter as well. Makes clean up a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good for the house projects.
customer_reviews.text: Youtube videos to learn basics techniques, and get a general knowledge of machines. This mig welder is for small and beginning welding projects. I purchased it to see if I could save some money on a welder. I was beyond surprised, my home projects are completed. I welded a bunch of my fence, trampoline, and exhaust from my truck with it (not my best looking work, but my equipment being used else where saved $). Max wire gauge it handled okay was 0.030 also buy a mask separately.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good starter welder.
customer_reviews.text: Well it was super cheap and I am a total newb welder but this thing does weld and I couldn't tell you if any bad welding was machine related but let's be honest it probably wasn't machine related. There are lots of videos on YouTube showing how you can turn this into a better welder with some mods.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Gordon

customer_reviews.title: I've done a few different projects with it and I'm pretty amazed with what it can do
customer_reviews.text: Not finished with the first spool yet. Power cord is faulty inside the suit case so I'll have to chase that issue down. I've done a few different projects with it and I'm pretty amazed with what it can do. I've popped the breaker about 6 times because I try running to long of a bead with it on high. You can run about a 3/8 stitch then she pops. If you just tack and let it cool for a few seconds you won't have any issues. On low setting you can run a pretty good bead without tripping a breaker. I highly recommended for small jobs at home.
customer_reviews.author: happywit it

customer_reviews.title: Good enough  for  the stuff , I,ll  be welding .  "Your weld is your signature ,so keep it neat"
customer_reviews.text: I hav'nt tried it yet , but I've been watching alot of youtube lately lol , so for the price I figured, what the hell . People were saying that the wire that comes with it sux, so I ordered the stuff that comes with the 3 things , welder ,wire (0.30) , and gloves The instructions could be better , and go online and buy a real helmet (hood) , but altogether , not a bad deal.
customer_reviews.author: denine cravatta

customer_reviews.title: It works good. I like the storage compartment
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for fixing my go kart. It doesnt allow to make actual welds but you can still make a straight line weld with it and they are pretty strong. Btw the wire it comes with is nice and strong. I wish it could be used in normal electrical socket but it pulls too many amps - that is why i give it 4 stars instead of 5
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Only gave 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Only gave 4 stars, because the instructions kind of suck and are fully of typos. The actual product has held up really well for not being name brand. I wasted tons of wire practicing, and the only hiccups were my fault. Great buy for the money. Can easily pay more for products that won't get as good of a weld without gas. TIP: Make sure you have a good extension chord. A cheap one will keep your breaker popping.
customer_reviews.author: dougjames

customer_reviews.title: So great, its like a toy you cant stop playing with!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this little work horse accomplishes all the tasks you would expect and then some! I bought this to install as a portable welder in my Suburban for welding out in the feild and helping those stuck because of broken parts while four wheeling. Craftsmanship and quality of materials are outstanding. So easy to use and fun, I spent hours upon hours welding, just because I can! I highly recommend this produxt for all you welding needs up to 1/4 inch steel!
customer_reviews.author: RAYMOND BROGAN PHD

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little mig welder for the hobbyist
customer_reviews.text: I love this welder. Works great for everything i've needed it for. would have given it 5 stars, but you can tell it's of a lower quality but that's absolutely fine with me. I got what i paid for which is all you can ask! Anyone looking for a cheap little mig welder with a good run rate, that's easy to use for small houshold stuff and hobbies won't be dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: R-Money

customer_reviews.title: Unit seems good, the instructions are worthless
customer_reviews.text: Unit seems good, the instructions are worthless. They don't tell you anything, especially how to install the roll of wire. Will update after 1st use Update: Unit works well, tried several welds. I think I will buy some Lincoln flux core wire. The wire that comes with it is not the greatest This welding unit is perfect for me. I needed some small jobs done and it performed perfectly !!! A 5 STAR RATING and a great store. THANK YOU AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've owned mine for a good while and I've done a lot of welding with it and it does a great job for a flux core welder. Really nice being able to have 4 heat adjustments to adjust to material you are welding . Highly recommend. And it makes good strong welds for a 130amp welder
customer_reviews.author: Michael spencer

customer_reviews.title: Investment of a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a really great surprise! I was skeptical but bought it and hoped for the best and was not disappointed. It's amazing. It's everything that's advertised. I took it on a job and welded 24 wrought iron panels and structural braces in no time with no problems at all. It's light weight and small size with totally big professional results cut my job time in half. This product is all it's supposed to be. I've been welding professionally for 2 decades and I really wish this machine had been around sooner. It's a dream welding machine. Buy it and make your job, day and life 100% easier. If your smart you'll buy it right now!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a great product
customer_reviews.text: I had a break in at my house and my very expensive welder was taken along with several other tools. I couldn't afford to replace it, but l had a job that required welding so I took a chance and bought this welder so I could finish the job, & I was truly amazed by how good this little welder worked, & it came with enough welding wire to finish the job I was working on.
customer_reviews.author: Restoguy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Can not believe for the price how great this MIG Welder works. Little practice pushing weld in a small "C" and go slow with sufficient heat and "BAM" --great welds. And get Tip Gell and dip tip every so often to prevent weld splatter from sticking to tip.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Baciorowski

customer_reviews.title: Tip is for sure ALWAYS HOT OMG! WHY does ...
customer_reviews.text: Tip is for sure ALWAYS HOT OMG! WHY does the trigger not activate / kill the tip???!!! Really dangerous, but cheap! I'm gonna modify it with an SSR to also kill the tip.
customer_reviews.author: David Winter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for homeowner DIY repairs.
customer_reviews.text: Had to purchase a welding mask, it comes with a hand held shield, but unless you have great jigs, a helper, or three hands, you'll need one too. You can get a good one for around $15 on amazon. Fixed a couple of things already, this is perfect for small homeowner jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wire feed / doesn’t feed consistently
customer_reviews.text: Works but wire feed isn’t very smooth so hard to make a good clean weld. I wish I would have spent a little more money and got a little better quality unit. If you just need to do some spot welds this works good. But if you want clean consistency in your weld buy one with a better wire feed. I wish I had bought a quality used unit rather than this one, it is better that nothing, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: The price is right
customer_reviews.text: My unit showed up in a sealed box however it was missing parts. Specifically the handle for the top. And the small parts bag had opened. Going by the paper work I’m missing a fuse, 2 screws, 1 extra tip, and a spring?
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Not a "MIG" Welder but Great Deal for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is not a "MIG" welder because "MIG" stands for 'metal inert gas' and this has no attachment for inert gas. It is however a great flux core wire automatic feed Welder for such a low price. I've used it so far to weld together the metal components for my gas forge and it worked great with no problems. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: The Human

customer_reviews.title: For the money, aces. With caveats.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had to use the mod to keep the feeder operating correctly yet. The lowest feed setting is really faster than I would like to use it. Can't imagine trying the higher setting!
customer_reviews.author: The skinny...Top Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Great, cheep, works
customer_reviews.text: I worked for the Santa Fe Railroad as a welder for 20 years. This machine works well for a inexpensive fix it welder. Gas would be better with it but I use it as it came and I like it. You must have a clear surface when welding. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: you'll love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mig welder for some small tack jobs I needed to do,but the first time I fired it up I was pleasantly surprised at the power it has .I use a 50 foot extension cord with this machine and it performs way beyond my expectations.I am very well pleased with my purchase,Thanks to Amazon for making this available to buyers like myself .I am now able to do more work with it that I thought would require a much more expensive welder,Thx. Dave
customer_reviews.author: david jackson

customer_reviews.title: Cooling fan not working.
customer_reviews.text: It welded great for a while until it stopped working because of over temp. I then saw the cooling fan not working. I returned the welder. Soon as I get my refund I will buy another one. We'll see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little welder
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light welder for home projects, or light mechanic work. Easy to use, even for beginners, and it lays down a pretty nicde weld, even with the additional splatter most of the gas less MIG welders have. Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: TXHITTMAN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value. Welds out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Welds out of the box. The flux wire it comes with is junk. I put in new wire .035 flux and it welds 1/8" with ease. I recommend this welder.
customer_reviews.author: a.u

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great right out of the box. Go ahead and get one of those auto dimming helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st welder my husband has ever had. Once he figured out how to remove the shroud (turn counter-clockwise) everything went smoothly. He did some welding on his older vehicle and, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: JERI GROTH

customer_reviews.title: bargain for beginners?
customer_reviews.text: easy to use for beginners? No instruction or user manual. Just figure it out through trial and error. Also with wire feed on 0 it still fed wire about an inch per second which is fast for a beginner in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Hogwash
customer_reviews.text: Set it up. Turned it on. Almost instantly smelled burning wires. Shut it down and asked for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Staggs

customer_reviews.title: good to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: Works OK....I welded exhaust pipe on mustang almost a year ago its still welded....good to have on hand. For quick welding projects
customer_reviews.author: mstevens

customer_reviews.title: If anyone wants to order one go for it I don't think you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I've been welding for years so for me to set it up was nothing for me. I've only been able to play around with it on a couple little things but it's pretty smooth running the wire ran through the line really good 👍. I'll be honest I can't really say for sure yet but I will say that I feel that it's gonna be a good piece of equipment for me.
customer_reviews.author: David Kenworthy

customer_reviews.title: Stick Welder loves this mig welder.
customer_reviews.text: Welder works great. I'm an old Navy stick welder from 30 years ago, and this mig welder is sooooo easy to use. Does exactly what it is suppose to do. Highly recommend this welder for small jobs. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money.  Exceptionally satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this welder twice since I recieved it. This welder, for the money, is great. The whip/lead could be made to be less to bend as easily. You dont want it to be flimsy because you'll kink your liner and if that happens your wire won't flow easily, and your weld will looks horrible and you might get porosity in your weld.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Darga

customer_reviews.title: Only the price is good!.
customer_reviews.text: Only the price is good!... But that can not weld! Try to use it and plugged in a 120v/ 20 amps dedicated line and if you hold the ark 5 seconds continue will trip the 20 amps breaker! Check the readings: ( the selector switches are on ( MIN & I ). Pulls 27 AMPS from the 120 plug!!! The voltage on secondary is 32.3 v, but no ark! On MAX & II we have 39.6v with no ark , but when hold the ark the voltage drops to 24v !!!!!! & the amps go over 35 amps....Used Flux 0.03. Is anyone truly satisfied with the job from this welder? Please be honest!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian B.

customer_reviews.title: For the money great welder
customer_reviews.text: It is so cheap it is disposable, but it has been working like champ so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Y.

customer_reviews.title: Wire feed is too fast
customer_reviews.text: The wire comes out very fast even on the 0 setting I think something is wrong. I guess what do you expect on a cheap welder. Probably have to return it?
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Two months later... still going strong
customer_reviews.text: For the price and power, this at home welder is perfect for small repairs and hobbyists.
customer_reviews.author: m oliver

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Ive been welding for years and this bad boy is great for around the house jobs
customer_reviews.author: Kim N.

customer_reviews.title: As good or better than some more expensive units
customer_reviews.text: Nice budget wire feed machine .. Works just as good as more expensive units .. Real welding hood not included.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Good welder
customer_reviews.text: Good welder but blows a 20 amp breaker on max power it needed a 30 amp breaker to work properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good little welder for around the house stuff
customer_reviews.text: good little welder for around the house stuff. don't expect it to do a whole lot as far as metal thickness goes. if you do expect it to weld everything you're not a very good welder.
customer_reviews.author: Naterball

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very happy my daughter is practicing with it works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: trg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for DIY and around the house jobs
customer_reviews.text: Fixed a 1 inch sq tubing fence and it welded perfect each time. My used ut for welding a 1/8 iron plate and was very happy with the results
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: This machine has been a life saver. I would recommend upgrading the mask and tools, but the machine works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for a beginner welder
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner welder this is the first world I done straight out of the box with this welder
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great welder for the $
customer_reviews.text: Welder is very easy to set and start welding, pretty straight forward. Awesome little welder for beginners and DIY projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... set right the welds came out just find and easy to do
customer_reviews.text: once I got the set right the welds came out just find and easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: jerel ploium

customer_reviews.title: Great welder to learn with
customer_reviews.text: Never welded before I bought this. I’ve used it to fix multiple things including an axle perch on my dump trailer. Definitely plan on getting a nicer, more capable welder in the future but this thing has surprised me by how well it’s worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great welder
customer_reviews.text: Preforms pretty good runs very smoothly producess a lot of splatter I may try a different bread of flux so far I have only used flux that came in package
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Maye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tinkering!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for my light welding jobs and this was absolutely perfect. From 16 gauge to 3/8 thick it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Deanareno

customer_reviews.title: Welder
customer_reviews.text: Good easy to use entry level welder go light to medium material
customer_reviews.author: leroy

customer_reviews.title: Product did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not weld right. My dad tried to use it and the machine was horrible DO NOT GET THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous12568

customer_reviews.title: No way to control feed
customer_reviews.text: It dont have controls so u can set how fast it feeds other than that it is a great welder for the money
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany ogle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not exactally what i thought it was easy set up works well
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: amazing price for a welder that can do plenty of
customer_reviews.text: As described, free of damage and worked well, amazing price for a welder that can do plenty of projects
customer_reviews.author: DragonFly

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. Brand new and it doesn’t work. As soon as you place the nozzle down it strikes and arc with the trigger being pulled Returning it today
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: For price awesome. Limited. Am converting to DC. Works better with flux core wire
customer_reviews.author: D G E

customer_reviews.title: Nice little starter.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little starter welder. Easy to setup and use. Very simple configuration. Just get an auto dimming welding visor and you're all set.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parks

customer_reviews.title: Cutoff the breakers a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and do the job. Is my first time used it and was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Justified

customer_reviews.title: hobby use
customer_reviews.text: Not very good gets too hot to quick shouts off
customer_reviews.author: Let's Ride

customer_reviews.title: welding machine
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE NOT USED AT THIS MOMENT BUT LOOK GOOD FOR THE PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: PJ.

customer_reviews.title: I think 🤔 it's good . As long as you recommend a digital smart welding helmet
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how good it works . Because with this , what you guys should recommend in the future is a welding helmet that has digital dimming option. That way you can see what you are doing ! Especially For beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Darriel Waters

customer_reviews.title: Run the welder only to a dedicated breaker
customer_reviews.text: High amp draw on a 120 volt circuit will pop a 20 amp breaker unless you isolate the welder and run it on a dedicated breaker for the the welder only
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think this is an excellent machine for little odd job repairs
customer_reviews.text: I weld with mig and stick all day at work. I think this is an excellent machine for little odd job repairs. I ran a bead 3F up 1/4" steel, very Impressed. It can do a little more then it says I believe.
customer_reviews.author: green Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it back in December an I've gone thru 4 spools of wire haven't had any issues w it...for less than $100 it was a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works better then I had hoped used it to weld rollcage in derby car held up amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good welding machine.
customer_reviews.text: Very good machine. It is small but does big job. I reviewed more than 10 different machine before I buy this. This one is the best one. wire is thin. you will need to buy extra wires.
customer_reviews.author: Unal

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for a nice
customer_reviews.text: Used once since I got and I can't complain. It lays a solid bead. Nice product for a nice price
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Good little welder mask and wire suck but welder it self works awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: My first welder so don't know much but I would say well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mc Farland

customer_reviews.title: Everything shown was not included
customer_reviews.text: Great deal but didn’t come with everything shown. Disappointed since we just opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Krahel

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to adjust. Sputter impossible to stop. The price is good.
customer_reviews.author: james costello

customer_reviews.title: Buy a helmet
customer_reviews.text: Good little unit for home use the mask is junk buy a good welding helmet and all is good.
customer_reviews.author: GARY SEYMOUR

customer_reviews.title: Great to learn with
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner and that is great to learn with!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Selena bell

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION LIVE HOT WIRE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little Welder for the Price! But The Weld Wire is HOT with out pulling the trigger! It's Not Good with out eye protection ready. More caution is need with Weld Wire HOT, LIVE when the power switch is turned on!!! That's this welders Bad point! Wire should be Hot after the trigger is Pulled, ONLY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.Gorski

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product that never worked.
customer_reviews.text: I received this welder and seemed to be as ordered...but once everything was assembled and ready to weld. The wire feed mechanism would not engage. It would not work at all. It was getting power to the wire but not to the wire feed motor. Amazon has been contacted and said I have to wait two business days to hear back from the third party vendor. So I am going buy a quality Lincoln or Miller like I should have to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse D. Hight

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything needed but the mask is a POS. Great welder for the price. Super handy
customer_reviews.author: Mike miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend. He likes it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Tellico Bill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for small projects. Fix the rusted out rear cross-member on my subaru legacy saved 500$
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm excited when I received this! Can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Y.

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: Can’t use because parts missing, all I got was machine,wire brush and mask. no instructions, wire, carrying handle and other items pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does not include half the stuff displayed in the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not include half the stuff displayed in the picture. Here's what is in the box: - brush - mask - some weird piece of plastic - welder Here's what's missing from the picture: - fuses - spring - spool - spool cap - spool joint - those 2 extra tips It's impossible to weld once you buy this thing, you'd have to go out and buy gasless flux corded wire and a real welding mask because they one they include is a plastic piece of fake junk. I think you are literally paying 90$ for the welder itself. You should have the wire, mask and everything else you need.
customer_reviews.author: George D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price and shipped way quicker then expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service with company
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I ordered the item and it arrived defective. The wire would not feed through the automatic feeder, but the company was very nice and prompt about replacing the welder. They sent me a new one to replace it. I was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall & Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hobby welder.
customer_reviews.text: This little cheap thing is actually very good if you do a few things first. There is no manual.. zero online help.. top it off, it is possible it can come to you incorrectly setup. My feeder wheel was on upside down and the feeder tube wasn't pushed through to the feeder. Avoid 20 amp outlets. Put it on a 30 amp plug and 'if' you dare use an extension cord make sure it is at least a 12 gauge, For the hobbyist this welder is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and is like shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: it works just beutifully it arrived just on time, and is like shown in the picture, recomend it, thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: jaime madrid romero

customer_reviews.title: very easy to used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mig welder for my brother, he loves it, very easy to used, much more welding power than my 90 amp Harbor Freights mig welder and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Must remember to always have the right voltage nice cool air
customer_reviews.text: When using this you can't use it very long or will overheat and shut down but for small projects that works great
customer_reviews.author: arthur scott

customer_reviews.title: Works great but you do need a 30 amp circuit to use it.
customer_reviews.text: This little welder works great for the price you can't beat it. I've welded a few exhausts up without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dave david

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was just what I wanted since I'm not a welder and need a lot of practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but capable.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little welder, i like that it dosent need any gas, and it plugs into a regular wall outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Super Deal PRO Commercial MIG 130 AC Flux Core Wire Automatic Feed Welder Welding Machine w/Free Mask 110V
feature_bullets: ★ SUPER DEAL MIG130 Welder is a top of the line household welder that is lightweight, powerful and intuitive. Made of high-class PVC material as well as delicate treatment, this welding machine integrates comfortable grip, easy operation and high precision.
★ Uses convenient Flux - Cored wire, self release metal-inert gas while welding, prevent oxidation of the welded part.

★ User-friendly interface - Makes set-up a snap with easy to access advanced options. SUPER DEAL mig130 gives you the power to tackle the biggest jobs with ease and confidence. Ready to weld out of the box.

★ Variable Feed Speed Control - Easily adjust current flow by adjusting the 4 buttons for MIN/MAX,1/2. Also features a wire feeding speed adjust rotary knob. 10 levels of wire feeding speeds for your choice. Torch With Full On / Off Safety Control

★ Compact and powerful - Weighs only 38 lbs. deal for shop, home or field use. Perfect for welding mild steel and stainless steel. Comes with a reel of 0.9mm, 0.55lbs welding wire, a protection mask and a brush/Chipping Hammer. 2.5M Torch, xtra 2 Tips and Ground Cord. Just what you're looking for, right?
